ai-thag6.7:1.3_0: Don’t be lazy and let the kinsman of the heedless,
ai-thag6.7:1.4_0: the King of Death, catch you in his trap.
ai-thag6.7:2.1_0: Like a wave in the mighty ocean,
ai-thag6.7:2.2_0: birth and old age sweep you under.
ai-thag6.7:2.3_0: Make a safe island of yourself,
ai-thag6.7:2.4_0: for you have no other shelter.
ai-thag6.7:3.1_0: The teacher has mastered this path,
ai-thag6.7:3.2_0: They’re included in birth and old age,
ai-thag6.7:4.1_0: Free yourself from your former bonds!
ai-thag6.7:4.2_0: Wearing your outer robe, with shaven head, eating almsfood,
ai-thag6.7:5.2_0: you’re an expert in the path to sanctuary.
ai-thag6.7:6.2_0: is bent down by the wind, like a creeper;
